attractions.name: Badshahi Mosque
attractions.description: One of the largest and most iconic mosques in Pakistan, built in 1673 by Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb.

attractions.name: Minar-e-Pakistan
attractions.description: A national monument symbolizing Pakistanâ€™s independence, located in Iqbal Park, Lahore.

attractions.name: Faisal Mosque
attractions.description: The largest mosque in Pakistan, known for its contemporary design and scenic location at the foothills of Margalla Hills.

attractions.name: Daman-e-Koh
attractions.description: A popular viewpoint offering panoramic views of Islamabad and the surrounding hills.
